luggage_tags.name: Recycled E=Leather Rectangular Luggage Tag with Security Flap
luggage_tags.description: Rectangular Luggage Tag with security flap, made from waste leather destined for landfill, bonded with water pressure to form a environmentally friendly product made in the UK for a low carbon footprint. Ideal for debossed, foil blocked or full colour branding.

luggage_tags.name: River Window Luggage Tag
luggage_tags.description: A hard-wearing luggage tag complete with paper insert, a clear protective cover, and a matching plastic strap.

luggage_tags.name: Recycled Luggage Tag
luggage_tags.decription: Standard Luggage tag, supplied with plastic worm loop and address label. Made in the UK from recycled plastic and digitally printed up to full colour in 1 position.

luggage_tags.name: Recycled Custom Shape Luggage Tag
luggage_tags.description: Custom Shaped Luggage Tag designed and manufactured in the UK from 100& recycled plastic.

luggage_tags.name: Luggage Tag Single (PET)
luggage_tags.description: 100% recyclable PET single Luggage Tag ith a high quality all over print.

luggage_tags.name: Swiss Peak Heritage RCS Rpu RFID Travel Wallet
luggage_tags.description: Luxury travel wallet with RFID protection keeps all your travel documents such as passport, tickets and money safe. With 4 slots for cards, a pen loop and space for your mobile phone. Made with RCS (Recycled Claim Standard) certified recycled materials. RCS certification ensures a completely certified supply chain of the recycled materials. Made with 100% recycled RCS certified recycled PU. Total recycled content: 36% based on total item weight. PVC free.

luggage_tags.name: Journey RPET Waist Bag
luggage_tags.description: The Journey waist bag made from recycled PET plastic is the perfect accessory from when on-the-go. Features a roomy, zippered main compartment for all your must-haves, as well as a zippered front pocket for extra storage.

luggage_tags.name: Thule Tact Anti-Theft Waist Pack
luggage_tags.description: Compact, bluesign® approved waist pack bag made from recycled materials with anti-theft features and organization for daily essentials.

luggage_tags.name: Bamboo Luggage Tag
luggage_tags.description: The Bamboo Luggage tags are laser engraved as standard and available within 5 working days delivery.The luggage tags include 4 standard write on fields at the back. Individual names engraving is available at an additional cost. We supply the stands bulk packed to reduce waste but can individually bag the badges using a biodegradable bag for an additional cost.

luggage_tags.name: Como Recycled Passport Wallet
luggage_tags.description: Passport Wallet in recycled Como, a quality vegan material, recycled from waste plastic bottles that would normally go to landfill. This high-quality vegan material has a subtle grain and is available in 8 colours. Includedudes one position deboss. Foil block or full colour print available.

luggage_tags.name: Recycled Como Loop Key Fob
luggage_tags.description: Made in the UK from Como a quality vegan material made from waste plastic bottles that would normally go to landfill. Available in 8 colours. Includes one position deboss.

Kitchen.name: Bootle Opener Lighter
Kitchen.description: Child-resistant disposable flint lighter with bottle opener on one end. Suitable for multicolour printing.

Kitchen.name: Glass Lunchbox With Bamboo Lid
Kitchen.description: Enjoy the safety of storing and heating your delicious home cooked meals in this glass bento box. With an airtight bamboo lid you can prepare your healthy meals at home and take them anywhere with you while keeping your food fresh. Made of high quality borosilicate glass which can withstand high thermal differences. Including handy spork.

Kitchen.name: Kitab Kitchen Apron In Cotton
Kitchen.description: Kitchen apron in 180 gr/m² cotton material. Convenient for your everyday cooking.

Kitchen.name: Delux Lunch Box With Air Tight Lid
Kitchen.description: Lunch box with air tight lid made of PP out side and stainless steel inside

Kitchen.name: Recycled Spork
Kitchen.description: The Spork is a New Welcomed addition to our food & drinkware range, made in the UK from recycled plastic and digitally printed in full colour as standard.

Kitchen.name: Rocks 4 Stone Ice Cubes In Pouch
Kitchen.description: Set of 4 reusable stone ice cubes in handy storage cotton draw cord pouch.

Kitchen.name: Neokit Cotton Oven Glove
Kitchen.description: Useful kitchen oven glove in cotton material with one side rubber material.

Kitchen.name: Wine&Cheese Cheese And Wine Set
Kitchen.description: Bamboo cheese and wine set. Includes a stainless steel-knife, cheese peeler, bottle opener and wine stopper. Presented in bamboo box

Kitchen.name: Treechesse Cheese Board Set In Bamboo
Kitchen.description: Tree-shaped bamboo cheeseboard set with knife cheese spreader in stainless steel. Bamboo is a natural product, there may be slight variations in colour and size per item, which can affect the final decoration outcome.

Kitchen.name: Metal Straw
Kitchen.description: If you're looking for a sustainable alternative to plastic straws, our Metal Straw is the ideal product. Made with food grade stainless steel, it is durable, reusable and environmentally friendly.

Kitchen.name: Campo Tea Bamboo Tea Box
Kitchen.description: Bamboo tea box with transparent glass lid. Within the 4 equally divided compartments you can easily hold up to 24 teabags. Bamboo is a natural product, there may be slight variations in colour and size per item, which can affect the final decoration outcome.

Kitchen.name: Munnar Teapot In Borosilicate Glass
Kitchen.description: High borosilicate glass teapot with stainless steel infuser and bamboo lid,. Capacity 850 ml. Bamboo is a natural product.

Kitchen.name: Belize Set Of 2 Double Wall Espresso
Kitchen.description: Set of 2 double wall espresso glasses with bamboo saucer. Presented in Kraft paper box. Capacity 90 ml.

Kitchen.name: Recycled Spaghetti Measure
Kitchen.description: paghetti Measure, to measure portions for 1, 2 or 3 people. Made in the UK from recycled plastic and digitally printed up to full colour as standard.

Kitchen.name: Ellwood Large Cutting Board
Kitchen.description: Large cutting board with groove, manufactured in EU from Alder wood. Made from 1 piece of wood, 100% natural

Kitchen.name: Chill Customisable Ice Cube Tray
Kitchen.description: This ice cube tray offers a novel way of presenting your logo or message on a very useful product. Your message can be added to the central area and/or to the base of each individual cube mould through relief moulding, for a tactile finish.

Kitchen.name: Ukiyo Aware 180Gr Rcotton Table Cloth 250X140Cm
Kitchen.description: Create the perfect dining space for special occasions with the Ukiyo Aware™ 180gr rcotton table cloth. The neutral design coordinates perfectly with your dining decor. Size 250x140cm. With Aware™ tracer that validates the genuine use of recycled materials. Each table cloth saves 5464.7 litres of water. 2% of proceeds of each product sold containing AWARE™ will be donated to Water.org.

Kitchen.name: Noun Recycled Neoprene Wine Sleeve Holder
Kitchen.description: Recycled neoprene wine sleeve holder with fine stitching and extra insulation to keep the wine cool for a longer time, while also making the bottle comfortable to hold. It stretches and expands to fit all kinds of bottle sizes to hold the bottle tight in place. It also protects your wine bottle from breakage during transport.

Kitchen.name: Oli 360 ml Ceramic Mug With Handle
Kitchen.description: Ceramic mug with a modern design and matt finish featuring a shiny interior with a colour-pop effect. Volume capacity is 360 ml. Dishwasher safe for all printing methods. Presented in a recycled cardboard gift box.

Kitchen.name: Bry Bamboo Cheese Grater
Kitchen.description: With this handheld and sturdy bamboo cheese grater it's easy and quick to grate some parmesan or cheddar cheese for all your favorite pasta dishes. The bamboo used is sourced and produced following sustainable standards.

Kitchen.name: Argulls Bamboo Salad Bowl And Tools
Kitchen.description: Bamboo salad set with a classic round-shaped bowl, salad spoon, and a salad fork, which is practical for everyday family dinners. The bamboo used is sourced and produced following sustainable standards.

Kitchen.name: Jardim 5-Piece Recycled Glass Set
Kitchen.description: 5-piece 100% recycled glass beverage drink set featuring 4 glasses (400 ml) and 1 dispenser (4L) with stainless steel lid. With this beverage dispenser set you can serve sangria, fresh juice, and ice tea on a grand scale with all features you’ll need to keep the party flowing. The fully assembled stainless steel tap provides an easy long-lasting pour every time. Every piece is made of recycled glass bottles. Recycled glass is manufactured using less energy, raw material, and additives, than what is required for making traditional glass. Dishwasher safe.

Kitchen.name: Juggo Recycled Glass Mug With Straw
Kitchen.description: This 550 ml glass mug with straw made of 100% recycled glass is perfect for drinking water, lemonades, teas, juices, or cocktails. The mug is made of recycled glass bottles and has a stainless steel screw cap making it right on trend for people who are looking to enjoy their favorite drink on-the-go. Recycled glass is manufactured using less energy, raw material, and additives, than what is required for making traditional glass. The mug and the straw are both dishwasher safe.

Kitchen.name: Verano Recycled Glass Cocktail Cup With Squeezer
Kitchen.description: 550 ml cocktail cup made of recycled glass, including a citrus squeezer and a straw. Made from 1 glass bottle. Recycled glass is manufactured using less energy, raw material, and additives, than what is required for making traditional glass.

Kitchen.name: Bamboo Bottle Opener with Fridge Magnet
Kitchen.description: The bamboo bottle openers come with 2 magnets as standard allowing these to be put onto any magnetic surface.Individual laser engraved names & biodegradable bag packing is available for an additional cost.Lead times are from just 5 days as standard.

Kitchen.name: Block Bottom Kraft Paper Bags
Kitchen.description: Grab bags have become quite popular in the food industry.Available in different standard sizes, different MOQ's for different sizes.Available in white or brown kraft.Prices are based on size: 180x100x230mm.

Kitchen.name: Food Flask
Kitchen.description: Our new and improved 400 ml / 13.5 fl oz vacuum insulated pot that is 100% leak proof and will keep your food hot for 6 hours or cold for 8 hours. 100% leakproof.Natural wood fibre spoon included. Full steel food contact. Elastic & machine-washable nylon strap.High quality stainless steel. BPA free.

Kitchen.name: Sugarcane Bags
Kitchen.description: These are made from sugarcane waste and is an eco friendly alternative to polythene. These are carbon neutral and 100% recyclable. Price is based on standard size 380w x 450h x 75g mm, for 1 colour to 2 sides.

Kitchen.name: Recycled Rice Scoop
Kitchen.description: Rice Scoop Measure, to measure 100 grams of dry rice. Made in the UK from recycled plastic and digitally printed up to full colour as standard.

Kitchen.name: Green & Good Plastic Coasters - Recycled
Kitchen.description: Also available full colour printed see Full Colour Coaster Coaster made from recycled CD case plastic available in a choice of bright colours.

Kitchen.name: Setboo Bamboo Cutlery Set
Kitchen.description: Re-usable bamboo cutlery set in canvas pouch. Includes knife, fork and spoon. Bamboo is a natural product, there may be slight variations in colour and size per item, which can affect the final decoration outcome.

Kitchen.name: Ellwood Runda Oval Board With Bark
Kitchen.description: Oval cutting board with bark manufactured in EU from Alder wood. Made from 1 piece of wood, 100% natural.
